alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 9:03PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Jackson, Greene and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...The Flood Warning remains in effect... The Flood Warning continues for the Pascagoula At Merrill. * From Friday evening until further notice. * At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 19.5 feet. * Flood stage is 22 feet. * Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to 23.5 feet Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. * Impact...At 23.5 feet, Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
